thread.title: Agata
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Agata

author: Agata
title: Agata
text:
Ecco has been my go-to shoe shop for a long long time.
The online delivery and returns are all up to the highest standard, of so of course are their shoes!
While not of them fit perfectly, I can freely order 5 pairs and then keep the 2 I like, returning the others for free.
Would recommend to anyone, for both excellent customer service and some of the most comfortable shoes ever made!
